SEARCH

All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
AboutPopUp
AboutPopUp displays information about the creators of CuriousMind.
AdapterProvider
Abstract provider for persistence adapters in the CuriousMind application.
AdapterProviderJPA
JPA-based adapter provider for the CuriousMind application.
AppConfig
Utility class for loading and accessing application configuration properties.
BackgroundComponent
BackgroundComponent provides a utility method to create a JPanel with a background image, a top bar showing the application title, and a configurable bottom bar with an action label.
BackgroundPanel
This class provides a JPanel with a scalable background image for the UI.
ContactPopUp
ContactPopUp displays contact information for CuriousMind.
ContentBlock
Represents a content block in a course, containing a list of questions and associated metadata.
ContentBlockRow
Utility class for creating a column of content block rows for a course.
Controller
Singleton main controller that orchestrates user, course, and game operations.
Course
Represents a course, which is a collection of content blocks, strategies, and metadata.
CourseAdapterJPA
JPA adapter implementation for course persistence operations.
CourseController
Singleton controller responsible for managing course-related operations.
CourseDashboard
CourseDashboard is the main window for displaying a course's details and its content blocks.
CourseItemPanel
CourseItemPanel represents a UI component for displaying a course item.
CourseLibrary
Singleton library for managing Course objects in memory and synchronizing with persistent storage.
CourseMapperJSON
JSON mapper implementation for converting between Course entities and JSON files.
CourseMapperJSON.IgnoreIdMixin
Mixin class to ignore the id property during JSON serialization.
CourseMapperService
Service for mapping Course entities to and from file representations in different formats.
CourseMapperYAML
YAML mapper implementation for converting between Course entities and YAML files.
CourseMapperYAML.IgnoreIdMixin
Mixin class to ignore the id property during YAML serialization.
CourseRowSection
CourseRowSection provides static methods to create JPanel sections that display courses or registered courses in a grid layout.
CoursesScrollPanel
This class provides a styled scrollable panel for displaying new courses.
CourseStrategyWindow
This class represents a dialog window that allows users to select a learning strategy for a specific course before registering for it.
CourseWithProgressPanel
A custom panel that displays a registered course item along with a progress bar.
CreateHeader
Utility class for creating the common header section in the question view.
CuriousMindApp
Main entry point for the CuriousMind application.
Difficulty
Represents the difficulty levels for content blocks.
FillTheGap
Represents a fill-in-the-gap question, where the user must provide the correct answer without selecting from options.
FillTheGaps
This class provides UI components for "Fill in the Gaps" type questions, where users are required to enter a short free-text answer into a text field.
FillTheGaps.GapSectionResult
Encapsulates the result of generating the gap section, including the UI panel and the text field containing the user's answer.
FlashCard
Represents a flashcard question, typically used for simple prompt-and-answer learning.
FlashCard
This class provides the functionality to create an interactive flashcard-based selection panel, where users choose one option represented by an image and label.
FlashCard.FlashCardResult
Encapsulates the result of creating the flashcard panel, including the UI component and the selected answer.
GameController
Singleton controller responsible for managing game logic and session flow.
GameManager
Manages the state and logic of a game session for a registered course and content block.
GlobalConstants
GlobalConstants contains static configuration values, labels, dimensions, and icon paths used throughout the CuriousMind application.
HomeWindow
This class represents the main home window of the CuriousMind application.
HoverEffect
This class provides hover effects for UI components.
IAdapter<T>
Generic adapter interface for basic CRUD operations in the persistence layer.
ICourseAdapter
Adapter interface for course-specific persistence operations.
ICourseMapper<R>
Mapper interface for converting between Course entities and data representations.
ImageButton
Utility class for creating a styled image button used to select a course strategy.
ImageOption
Represents an option for a question that includes an associated image, such as for image-based multiple-choice questions.
ImageUtils
Utility class for image-related operations.
IMapper<T,R>
Generic mapper interface for converting between entities and data transfer objects (DTOs).
IUserAdapter
Adapter interface for user-specific persistence operations.
JsonChooserWindow
This class represents a dialog window that allows users to import a course by selecting a JSON or YAML file from the file system.
Library<T>
Interface for a generic library that manages objects of a specific type.
LoadIcon
Utility class for loading and scaling icons for the UI.
Logger
Logger utility class for logging messages to both the console and a temporary log file.
LoginWindow
LoginWindow is the main window for user authentication.
MapperFormat
 
NavigationBar
NavigationBar provides a navigation panel with links to "About Us", "Contact", and the current page.
Option
Represents a selectable option for a question, such as a possible answer in a multiple-choice or flashcard scenario.
Question
Abstract base class representing a question in the system.
QuestionIterator
An iterator for traversing and managing a list of questions in a content block or game session.
QuestionStructure
A JFrame that displays and manages different types of questions (Fill the Gap, Translation, FlashCard, Test) for a given course and difficulty level.
RegisteredContentBlock
Represents a registered content block for a user within a registered course.
RegisteredCourse
Represents a registered course for a user, tracking their progress and strategy within a specific course.
RoundedLabel
A custom JLabel with rounded corners, custom background, and border color.
RoundedPanel
RoundedPanel is a custom JPanel with rounded corners.
RoundedProgressBar
RoundedProgressBar is a custom JProgressBar with rounded corners, designed for visually appealing progress display in the UI.
SectionTitle
This class provides a styled section title panel for UI sections.
Sequential
The Sequential enum implements a strategy for presenting questions in their original order.
Shuffled
The Shuffled enum implements a strategy for shuffling questions in a content block.
SignupWindow
 
SpacedRepetition
The SpacedRepetition enum implements the spaced repetition learning strategy.
Stat
Represents the statistics and progress tracking for a user in the system.
StatsBlock
StatsBlock is a custom JPanel that displays a statistic with a title, value, and icon.
Strategy
Strategy interface for defining different question ordering and processing algorithms in a course.
StrategyProvider
Provides dynamic discovery and instantiation of available Strategy implementations for question ordering and processing.
StrategyType
 
StyledButton
StyledButton is a custom JButton with rounded corners, custom border colors, and hover effects for a modern UI appearance.
Test
Represents a test (multiple-choice) question, where the user selects the correct answer from a list of options.
Test
This class provides functionality to generate a test panel where users can select one answer from multiple options using toggle buttons.
Test.TestPanelResult
Encapsulates the result of generating the test panel, including the rendered panel and the selected answer.
Translate
Represents a translation question, where the user is expected to translate a statement and provide the correct answer.
Translation
This class provides utility methods to create interactive UI components for translation-based questions.
Translation.TranslationSectionResult
Encapsulates the result of creating a translation section, including the UI panel and the list of selected words.
User
Represents a user in the CuriousMind application.
UserAdapterJPA
JPA adapter implementation for user persistence operations.
UserController
Singleton controller responsible for managing user authentication, profile, and statistics.
UserLibrary
Singleton library for managing User objects in memory and synchronizing with persistent storage.
UserWindow
Represents the user profile window in the CuriousMind application.
